name: Rose
description: A type of flowering shrub that comes in a variety of colors.
careInstructions: Water regularly and provide full sun.

name: Sunflower
description: Tall plants with large yellow flowers that turn to face the sun.
careInstructions: Water regularly and provide full sun.

name: Tulip
careInstructions: Water regularly and provide well-drained soil.

name: Lavender
careInstructions: Water sparingly and provide full sun.

name: Daffodil
description: Bulbous plants with bright yellow flowers.
careInstructions: Water regularly and provide full sun or partial sun.

name: Orchid
description: Diverse and widespread family of flowering plants.
careInstructions: Provide indirect sunlight and water moderately.

name: Bamboo
description: Fast-growing grass with a woody stem.
careInstructions: Water regularly and provide full sun or partial sun.

name: Cactus
description: Succulent plants adapted to arid conditions.
careInstructions: Provide full sun and water sparingly.

name: Fern
careInstructions: Provide indirect sunlight and keep soil moist.

name: Aloe Vera
description: Succulent plant known for its medicinal properties.
careInstructions: Provide full sun and water sparingly.
